data.title: Hero Wanted - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Hero Wanted with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
2008

1 hr 35 mins

Drama, Action & Adventure

R

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Cuba Gooding Jr. is one bad hombre in this action-packed revenge thriller. He plays Liam Case, a trash collector who is wounded in a bank robbery during which a teller is killed. Not one to sit back, Case tracks down the criminals and exacts vengeance in several particularly painful ways. Ray Liotta costars as a hard-nosed cop who might be on Case's side. Kim Coates, Norman Reedus, Thomas Flannigan, Ben Cross, Jean Smart.
